ATTENTION!!!
Don't change any DEFAULT properties.

You could change some properties in the file "config.json" as far as:
"port_custom":0(default);
"root_absolute":""(default).
Just insert new pathname and restart the server app.
ATTENTION!!!
The parameter "root_absolute" should be used only with "\\" instead of "\"!
for instance:
"D:\\GeekBrains\\20191130_GB-Разработка_сетевого_хранилища_на_Java\\cloudstorage\\server\\target"

Users files are in the directory "storage"(default).

To create a new "cloud storage" MySQL database use the following sql request:
-- MySQL Script generated by MySQL Workbench
-- Sun Feb 23 07:59:41 2020
-- Model: New Model    Version: 1.0
-- MySQL Workbench Forward Engineering

SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,NO_ZERO_DATE,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION';

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema mydb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema cloudstoragedb
-- -----------------------------------------------------

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema cloudstoragedb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `cloudstoragedb` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ;
USE `cloudstoragedb` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `cloudstoragedb`.`users`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cloudstoragedb`.`users` (
  `login` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `username` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT 'Test_name',
  `email` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Test_email',
  `secure_hash` BLOB NOT NULL,
  `secure_salt` BLOB NOT NULL,
  `create_time` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`login`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `email_UNIQUE` (`email` ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
COMMENT = 'this schema is for lys studying project GB Cloud Storage';


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
